imdb.title: One Outs
imdb.plot: Hiromichi Kojima, the star batter of the Lycaons, heads to the southern Japanese island of Okinawa to train and find a new pitcher for the team. There, he meets Toa Tokuchi, a 134-kmph pitcher and the undisputed king of a gambling...

episodes.title: Nazo no otoko
episodes.plot: An accomplished cleanup hitter, Hiromichi Kojima, forms a training camp in the island of Okinawa looking for ways to achieve his goal of winning a championship.

episodes.title: Shôbushi
episodes.plot: In the midst of his training Kojima meets Toua Tokuchi, a sensational amateur pitcher who has never been beaten.

episodes.title: Wannautsu keiyaku
episodes.plot: Kojima swears he's beat Tokuchi as both put a lot on the line in a wage against each other

episodes.title: Nain no shikaku
episodes.plot: Saikawa, owner of team Lyacons, keeps all segments of team under control. Season starts, but Tokuchi is not playing. Saikawa is waiting for other teams to prepare for Tokuchi.

episodes.title: Kibô
episodes.plot: Yoshida is informing Tokuchi about his past dealings with club owner. As much continues Tokuchi feels tired.

episodes.title: Teikaiten sutorêto
episodes.plot: Match against mariners started. After two walks Tokuchi is facing first of three big hitters Tomas. Takami and Klyn waiting for their turn.

episodes.title: Trick & Trap
episodes.plot: Second game against Mariners starts. Mariners think they know Tokuchi's weakness and their goal in this game is not to win, but to destroy Tokuchi.

episodes.title: Hansoku gassen
episodes.plot: Game 3 against Mariners continue. Mariners lead 14-0. As rain started parts of Tokuchi's plan are revealed.

episodes.title: Kecchaku
episodes.plot: Saikawa force game three to continue despite heavy rain. Tokouchi is planing to win game, but not to loose 14 billion yen to Saikawa.

episodes.title: Chishô vs. Shôbushi
episodes.plot: Game against Bugaboos starts. But Tokuchi is not starting. Instead of him Lycaons starting pitcher is Kajiwara.

episodes.title: Sekai saisoku no otoko
episodes.plot: Bugaboos managers is giving interview about Johnson. He is explaining how Tokuchi is too slow for him. After that Saikawa increase money bet for next game against Bugaboos.

episodes.title: Hissatsu tôhô
episodes.plot: Second game against Bugaboos continues. Tokuchi continues with his batting and testing Johnson trying to find some weakness.

episodes.title: Fuin Sareta Ashi
episodes.plot: Game 3 against Bugaboos is starting. Bugaboos start hitter is Johnson, but all other hitters are left-handed. This should counter Tokuchi's tactic from last game.

episodes.title: Kyu-nin Naiya
episodes.plot: Game 3 against Bugaboos continues. Tokuchi is pitching while Bugaboos have runners on second and third base. And runner on second base is Johnson. They are planing to sacrifice runner on third so Johnson can move there.

episodes.title: Hitori Naiya
episodes.plot: Game 3 against Bugaboos goes in to extra innings. Lycaons manager Mihara finally realizes something strange is going between Tokuchi and Saikawa.

episodes.title: Torikku sutajiamu
episodes.plot: Lycaons members celebrate victory in last game. Rain delays matches against Fingers. For the games against BlueMars Saikawa make bet with manager Mihara.

episodes.title: Inchiki Nakkuru
episodes.plot: First game against BlueMars continues. Result is tied after 8 innings. Williams start pitching for BlueMars.

episodes.title: Nusumareta Sain
episodes.plot: Game two against BlueMars starts with Namunna and Mitsui as pitchers. Saikawa expect Tokuchi to overwork himself in game two so he can trap him in game three.

episodes.title: Yami Shingo
episodes.plot: Second game against BlueMars continues with BlueMars lead 5-3. while Lycaons still try to find how their opponents stealing their signs BlueMars are changing pitcher.

episodes.title: Honro
episodes.plot: Second game against BlueMars continues. Ideguchi who is first batter know about BlueMars stealing signs, but most of Lycaons team don't.

episodes.title: Roei
episodes.plot: Lycaons and BlueMars prepare for game three. Tokuchi suggest new strategy to his teammates. Starting pitcher for BlueMars is Shirokami and for Lycaons is Ishiyama.

episodes.title: Tocho
episodes.plot: Game 3 against BlueMars continues. Tokuchi realized that BlueMars wiretapped their team, but details of wiretap are still unknown. So Lycaons will test it few times.

episodes.title: Koryaku
episodes.plot: Game 3 against BlueMars continues. Lycaons comeback continues based on giving false information to wiretap. BlueMars manager is determine to win at any cost.

episodes.title: Inbo
episodes.plot: Game 3 against BlueMars continues in the 9th inning. Williams can't use his altered ball against Tokuchi who is exposing weaknesses of altered ball.

episodes.title: Shori no Saki ni
episodes.plot: Game 3 against BlueMars continues. While they are loosing in the game BlueMars players are more trying to injure Tokuchi than to come back.
